column4: Hi all. What's the package to install other packages such as limewire and skype? Thx.
I'd recommend frostwire over limewire
you need to be more specific then
no. automatix = bad
really.  Use the medibuntu repository if you want skype.  There's no reason to use automatix.  Read the link ubotu gave you about it to see why
Ok, let me read it then. Thx a million.
use the medibuntu to install skype.  Instead of limewire, install frostwire (google and install the .deb from their site)
gparted
did you format it?
No.
format it
ok.. what tool should I use?
ok!
what filesystem???
you have to decide that.  If you are only going to be using it with linux, I'd go with ext3
And if I want to keep the door open to MS?

well then you might want to consider vfat but then you lose the ability to set permissions on the files.  Personally, I would still go with ext3 and just use a special driver on windows to access the files
What other problems could I have other than loosing file permissions? This does not sem a big problem for me...
don't see others
Do u think vfat would work smoothly using a backup tool like sbackup?
you may have some problems but that's just a guess
you can always test it out and switch if there's a problem
I dont like problems... :-)
Thanks a lot! :)
